title: Spacious 3 bed 1 bath Apartment
map_address: 8137 S Maryland Ave near 1 block East of Cottage Grove
app_fee: $45 non-refundable. Covers credit and background checks.
posting_body: ['Beautiful 3 bed 1 bath apartment for rent.', 'Large formal Living Room and Dining Room.', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', 'Ceramic tile in kitchen and bath.', 'One off-street parking space included.', 'Wrought Iron fencing surrounds building and backyard.', 'Tenant pays heat and electric.', 'No smoking building.', 'No pets.']
